description: Room TypeConverter fails to convert between custom types and database types, causing runtime crashes or data corruption.
commonCauses: Conversion throws exception on invalid data
solutions: Handle null values explicitly in converter
Add try-catch in converter with fallback
Use JSON for complex objects with Gson/Moshi
Include all enum values in converter
prevention: Test converters with null, empty, and invalid data
Use standard formats: ISO-8601 for dates, JSON for objects
Document converter behavior in code comments
Avoid storing complex objects; normalize instead
Use sealed classes for type-safe conversions
Validate converter roundtrip in unit tests
examples: @TypeConverter fun fromTimestamp(value: Long?): Date? = value?.let { Date(it) }
